speaker: speaker1
text: How was your education going on in Australia ?

speaker: speaker2
text: I'm going to graduate this summer .

speaker: speaker1
text: Where are you going to work then , in Australia or back in China ?

speaker: speaker2
text: I'm planning to return to China after graduation .

speaker: speaker1
text: Why are you choosing to leave a foreign country ? Many people are reluctant to leave the superior living environment abroad .

speaker: speaker2
text: Well , I think personal development is much more important than simply having a superior living environment .

speaker: speaker1
text: Yeah , China's developing so fast and development opportunities can be found almost in every corner of the country .
